about_the_game:
Are you ready for a thrilling adventure? Introducing Mask Quest, a platform game by increpare and undef hitting the scene in 2024! Join our fearless hero on a heart-pounding adventure to find an elusive mask, where the key to success is all in your breath. Travelling through a big ol' pixelly city and its environs, filled with equal parts danger and excitement.

In this game you will do fun activities like

1: Police Brutality


2: Hyperventilate


3: Go Sailing


4: Drown


With old-school platforming mechanics, more than 50 exciting levels, and a full original soundtrack, you'll be entertained for hours. But watch out - you'll have to navigate around enemies, spikes, perform death-defying jumps, and hold your breath for longer than you might be comfortable with. Make friends along the way, and see if you have what it takes to conquer Mask Quest!

Fully translated into English, German, French, Chinese, Greek, Latin, and Toki Pona.

Don't miss out on the fun - add it to your wishlist today and be the first to play when it releases in 2024!

content_descriptors.notes:
vulgar langage
mention of drug use
jokes with sexual content
comic violence (not graphic)

  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo 2.4GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5000 or better
